name: VERDEA SOUTHMOUNT
blurb: Verdea captures an intimate community embraced by green, highlighting the warmth and dynamism of verdant spaces. Spanning close to 25 hectares within an emerging Ayala Land estate, it’s the quintessential suburban living experience in the South.

name: SOUTH PALMGROVE
blurb: South Palmgrove is Alveo Land’s first residential address in Lipa, Batangas, where landscapes of symmetry and balance surround. Embrace the calming comfort of a secure residential community, as you appreciate the simple quiet moments to nurture precious time with friends and family.

name: CALEIA VERMOSA

name: EVO CITY COMMERCIAL
blurb: Evo City, the first of its kind in Kawit, sets the standard for modern central business districts with forward-thinking urban design, efficient systems, and enhanced opportunities for living and investment. As a thriving hub for both emerging and established businesses, Evo City West District offers 31 commercial lots spread across seven blocks. Strategically positioned near Evo City Boulevard, across the Visitor Center and Church, and adjacent to The Residences at Evo City, these spaces are ideally located at the estate's core. Similarly, Evo City South District introduces 18 prime lots in its initial phase. Situated along the Daang-Hari Link Road and Innovation Drive, and neighboring The Residences at Evo City, the South District serves as a dynamic center for modern commercial ventures.
